useCase.name: Use Case: Template Management in Recruitment
useCase.trigger: Team Member requests for email templates to Recruitment Coordinator (RC).

mainSequence.step: Recruitment Coordinator checks existing templates in Template Database
Template Database informs about template availability to Recruitment Coordinator
Recruitment Coordinator requests template specifics from Team Member
Recruitment Coordinator creates new template draft
Recruitment Coordinator submits draft to Approval Authority for approval
Approval Authority requests revisions from Recruitment Coordinator
Recruitment Coordinator revises the template as requested
Recruitment Coordinator resubmits revised template for approval
New template stored in the Template Database by Recruitment Coordinator
Recruitment Coordinator informs Team Member about the availability
Appropriate templates provided to Recruitment Coordinator
